reviewText:
The film is amazing! It good to be presented at Cannes and it may win! I least I wish it to win.  Truly brilliant! The subtitles were very good!
I don't know much about this director, but whoever he ishuge thank you! I bet you it's not thought well of in Russia, which is probably painful. But they're too busy american s***ty films, Hollywood  crap which we feed them unfortunately. I am not big fan of SF or Strugazky brothers, but this film is worth every minute of it!
